description: I walked down a shopping road in Prague-Zizkov. It was already quite late that day. Then I saw a sportive guy who looked a little bit desperate. He walked fast. So I had to run to approach him. I told him that I am filming for a project of my university and I asked him for an interview. He patiently answered all questions about his social situation and I realized that he was not just unemployed – he was totally broke. So I started my favorite game. How little can be enough to make a straight boy strip and wank. Again it didn't take long and we had a deal. He took me to his house – he lives together with his mum. And I convinced him to strip in the floor. I inspected his hole and penis and touched him everywhere. Then he started to jerk till his cum dripped down to the ground.
title: Czech Hunter 07
